<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_011-7a>¶
11.7季康子問

11.8顏淵死，¶

子曰：¶
「才不才，¶

鯉也死，¶

11.11顏淵死，¶

曰：¶
「敢問死。」¶

「未知生，¶

子樂。¶
「若由也，¶
不得其死然。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_011-16a>¶	KR1c0012_009:31b:3:1:0,KR1c0012_009:31b:5:6:0,KR1c0012_010:15b:4:15:0,KR1e0013_001:19a:6:17:7,KR1e0023_001:56b:3:15:0,KR1e0032_015:5a:7:18:2,KR1g0009_006:4b:2:23:2,KR1g0009_007:13b:3:2:3,KR1h0004_011:7a:55:1:12,KR1h0004_014:1a:26:2:6,KR1h0005_006:5a:1:10:0,KR1h0005_007:12b:2:16:0,KR1h0006_004:6a:2:35:12,KR1h0006_005:1b:4:29:5,KR1h0006_006:7b:1:5:14,KR1h0006_006:7b:5:8:14,KR1h0006_006:7b:5:32:14,KR1h0006_007:21b:7:12:35,KR1h0006_007:22a:6:16:35,KR1h0006_007:22a:7:3:35,KR1h0007_011:6b:8:21:12,KR1h0007_011:7a:3:25:12,KR1h0007_014:2b:8:6:7,KR1h0007_014:3a:7:14:7,KR1h0007_014:30a:9:2:43,KR1h0007_014:30a:10:17:43,KR1h0012_006:6a:4:7:21,KR1h0012_006:6a:8:7:22,KR1h0012_007:24a:4:16:68,KR1h0013_013:9b:7:12:13,KR1h0015_006:3b:6:2:4,KR1h0015_006:29a:1:2:13,KR1h0017_011:16b:1:7:70,KR1h0017_014:7a:1:16:37,KR1h0019_002:68a:9:7:218,KR1h0019_002:68b:4:19:219,KR1h0019_002:68b:6:18:219,KR1h0019_003:20a:8:16:72,KR1h0020_003:3b:9:7:22,KR1h0020_003:31a:8:16:137,KR1h0021_000:135b:1:7:629,KR1h0021_000:135b:4:20:630,KR1h0021_000:172b:7:16:773,KR1h0024_011:4b:8:14:4,KR1h0024_012:12b:6:14:6,KR1h0024_012:25b:3:25:6,KR1h0026_006:5b:6:7:25,KR1h0026_007:20b:9:16:75,KR1h0028_009:9b:11:4:41,KR1h0028_010:28b:6:16:121,KR1h0030_007:2b:6:2:5,KR1h0030_007:3a:1:35:5,KR1h0030_008:8b:2:13:9,KR1h0034_009:9a:7:4:41,KR1h0034_010:34b:1:16:124,KR1h0034_010:43a:3:39:142,KR1h0038_010:7b:5:4:41,KR1h0038_010:8a:3:26:42,KR1h0038_011:20b:6:16:125,KR1h0038_011:20b:9:2:125,KR1h0043_011:13b:5:4:41,KR1h0043_011:14b:2:35:42,KR1h0043_011:14b:4:28:42,KR1h0043_014:7a:1:16:16,KR1h0043_014:18b:8:2:34,KR2a0001_500:118a:7:1:117,KR2a0001_500:169a:4:2:168,KR2a0002_065:4b:7:17:1,KR2a0002_065:15b:6:34:1,KR2a0004_067:3b:1:18:1,KR2a0004_067:14a:2:1:1,KR2a0007_100:19a:6:25:2,KR2b0003_006:5b:7:17:4,KR2b0003_028:5b:7:17:75,KR2b0003_030:5b:7:17:71,KR2b0003_030:5b:7:17:227,KR2b0007_095:36b:7:10:2,KR2b0008_004:13a:10:9:2,KR2c0021_095:120a:5:20:3,KR2c0021_095:186b:1:20:4,KR2d0005_032:26a:3:10:1,KR2d0006_1 # src: LY 11.14; tr. CH
11.14魯人為長府。¶

11.16子貢問：¶
「師與商也孰賢？」¶	KR1g0009_006:5b:3:4:2,KR1h0004_011:7a:71:1:15,KR1h0006_006:9a:4:5:17,KR1h0007_011:8a:9:4:15,KR1h0007_011:8b:2:36:15,KR1h0012_006:7a:7:4:27,KR1h0015_006:4a:6:28:4,KR1h0017_011:20a:10:4:89,KR1h0017_034:30b:7:1:111,KR1h0019_002:70b:5:4:224,KR1h0021_000:137a:6:4:635,KR1h0024_011:7a:5:7:4,KR1h0026_006:7a:9:4:32,KR1h0028_009:11b:4:4:53,KR1h0034_009:11a:6:4:53,KR1h0038_010:9a:10:4:53,KR1h0039_003:30a:5:4:161,KR1h0043_011:16b:6:4:53,KR2d0005_032:19a:7:2:1,KR3a0048_007:7b:2:1:2,KR3a0051_001:25a:2:2:0,KR3a0059_016:42b:1:4:6,KR3j0120_004:2b:1:21:0,KR3k0013_826:9a:5:1:2,KR3k0046_054:34b:4:14:2,KR4c0055_006:9b:8:30:4,KR4d0254_011:31b:4:4:1,KR4e0225_004:27a:7:4:26,KR4h0022_680:5a:8:3:6,KR4h0024_085:9b:8:21:19,KR4h0132_219:17b:3:18:8,KR4h0147_020:7b:3:13:11,KR6d0019_001:0161c:5:20:51,KR6d0020_001:0489a:13:12:37,KR6d0063_004:0191b:24:7:96

「師也過，¶

11.17季氏富於周公，¶

# src: LY 11.18; tr. CH
11.18柴也愚，¶
參也魯，¶
師也辟，¶
由也喭。

# src: LY 11.19; tr. CH
<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_011-22a>¶

11.20子張問善人之道。¶
子曰：¶
「不踐迹，¶

# src: LY 11.26:01; tr. CH

「求！¶
爾何如？」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_011-39a>¶

「赤！¶
爾何如？」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_011-41a>¶

願學焉。¶

「點！¶
爾何如？」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_011-43a>¶

子曰：¶
「何傷乎？¶

詠而歸。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_011-46a>¶

# src: LY 11.26:07; tr. CH
